ack.p: The authors thank Dr A C Mishra, ex-Director, NIV and Dr. D T Mourya Director, NIV. Thanks are due to Mr Walkoli, Mr Jawalkar and Mr Prasad Babar for collecting blood samples. We appreciate the help by the health authorities, Maharashtra state for the valuable support. We gratefully acknowledge the technical support team from Life Technologies for the training and excellent assistance during sequencing. We extend our thanks to Ocimum Biosolutions for valuable support in data collection and analysis. Mr Shirish Vaidya is acknowledged for computer assistance during the preparation of the manuscript.
